name: Wrapper
description: Conditional wrapper for preserving widget structure.

use: you need to wrap a child only under certain conditions.
you want to preserve widget subtree identity across rebuilds.
avoid: a simple `if` in the build method is enough.

examples.minimal:
Wrapper(
  wrap: isEnabled,
  builder: (context, child) => Padding(
    padding: const EdgeInsets.all(8),
    child: child,
  ),
  child: const Text('Wrapped'),
)

theming: Not applicable; style within the wrapper builder.
accessibility: Ensure wrapper changes do not alter semantics unexpectedly.
do: Use `maintainStructure` when identity must stay stable.
dont: Overuse when a simple layout change is enough.
